Lr.purpose: Cell array of strings containing the labels of the rows of the input

Lc.purpose: Cell array of strings containing the labels of the columns of the input

Sup_CorAna.purpose: Structure containing indexes or names of supplementary rows or columns

fields.name: r
fields.purpose: vector containing row indexes or vector of cell array of strings or table or 2D numeric array, containing supplementary rows

fields.name: Lr
fields.purpose: cell array of strings containing the labels of the supplementary units if Sup.r is a 2D numeric array

fields.name: c
fields.purpose: vector containing column indexes or vector of cell array of strings or table or 2D numeric array use as supplementary columns, or table or 2D numeric array containing supplementary rows

fields.name: Lc
fields.purpose: cell array of strings containing the labels of the supplementary units if Sup.c is a 2D numeric array

robust_pcaFS.purpose: Specify Robust PC, called by pcaFS

fields.name: bsb
fields.purpose: units forming subset on which to compute the svd

fields.name: class
fields.purpose: Choose between Forward Search, Minimum Covariance Determinator or MM estimators

fields.name: bdp
fields.purpose: Fractions of outliers the algorithm should resist

fields.name: eff
fields.purpose: nominal efficiency to use for MM estimator

inputs.name: N
inputs.purpose: Contingency table (default) or n-by-2 input dataset

inputs.name: k
inputs.purpose: Number of dimensions to retain

inputs.name: Lr
inputs.purpose: Vector of row labels

inputs.name: Lc
inputs.purpose: Vector of column labels

inputs.name: Sup
inputs.purpose: Structure containing indexes or names of supplementary rows or columns

inputs.name: datamatrix
inputs.purpose: Data matrix or contingency table

inputs.name: plots
inputs.purpose: Display plots on screen

inputs.name: dispresults
inputs.purpose: Display results on screen

inputs.name: d1
inputs.purpose: Dimension to show on the horizontal axis

inputs.name: d2
inputs.purpose: Dimension to show on the vertical axis

outputs.name: out
outputs.purpose: Structure containing the output of the function
